page.title: 20PAGE 2
page.content: Most families live in semi-detached houses, 47%. 29% live in terraced houses; 13% live in detached houses; 6% live in flats; 2.5% live in a bungalow and 2.5% live in town houses. 20% of fathers are unskilled or semi-skilled manual workers; 33% are skilled manual workers; 14% are supervisors; 11% are self-employed; 21% are in white collar jobs and 11% are in managerial or lower professional jobs. 88% of families take a daily newspaper. 28% read The Sun; 25% The Mirror; 13% The Telegraph; 9.5% The Express; 9.5% The Daily Mail and 3% The Guardian. 66% have home computers. 63% have video recorders. 3% attend church regularly. Written by Stephanie Anderton.
